maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: It all started several years ago...
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Tout a commencé plusieurs années auparavant...

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: At a time when we were all still employed by Instatainment.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: À l'époque, nous étions encore tous des employés d'Instatainment.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: Satoshi...\. he was one of the head software-engineers for CrossWorlds.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Satoshi...\. il était l'un des développeurs en chef pour CrossWorlds.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: He was responsible for implementing the \c[3]avatar controlling module\c[0].
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Il était responsable de l'implémentation du \c[3]module de contrôle des Avatars\c[0].

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: You see... since avatars are controlled with a \c[3]mere thought\c[0], this part was one of the most complex, and difficult to get right.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Tu vois... vu que les avatars sont contrôlés par une \c[3]simple pensée\c[0], cette partie était la plus compliquée et la plus difficile à maitriser.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: Yet Satoshi... he succeeded in creating a reliable connection.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Et pourtant, Satoshi... il a réussi à créer une connexion fiable entre le joueur et son avatar.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: He developed a neural network analysing the player's neural oscillation.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Il a développé un réseau neuronal qui analyse l'activité neuronale du joueur.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: After just a short learning phase, it allowed for controlling your avatar like it was your own body.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Après une courte phase d'apprentissage, il permettait de contrôler ton avatar comme si c'était ton propre corps.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: It was a technological masterpiece, called the \c[3]CrossCode\c[0].
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: C'était un chef-d'œuvre technologique, appelé le \c[3]CrossCode\c[0].

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: After some time though... Satoshi discovered something new.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Mais quelque temps plus tard... Satoshi à découvert quelque chose d'autre.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: The CrossCode went beyond just analysing players' thoughts to control avatars.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Le CrossCode ne faisait pas qu'analyser les pensées des joueurs pour contrôler les avatars.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: Using the same neural network as a foundation... it was possible to entirely simulate features of the brain.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: En utilisant le même réseau neuronal comme fondation... il était possible de simuler entièrement le fonctionnement du cerveau.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: Perception, logical thinking, emotions...\. even memories.
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: La perception, la pensée analytique, les émotions...\. et même les souvenirs.

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: Before you knew it... the CrossCode evolved into a \c[3]fully-fledged A.I.\c[0].
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Avant même que l'on s'en rende compte... le CrossCode évolua vers une \c[3]IA entièrement fonctionnelle\c[0].

maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.orig: And it could run an avatar... without the player. A so called \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
maps/flashback/sergey-1.json/entities/75.text: Et il pouvait contrôler un avatar... sans son joueur. On appelait ça, un \c[3]Évotar\c[0].

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Satoshi was very excited by his discovery.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Satoshi était très joyeux de sa découverte.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: He pitched his findings to the higher-ups... hoping to develop a fully autonomous AI based on the CrossCode.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Il espérait pouvoir convaincre ses supérieurs de pouvoir développer une IA entièrement autonome à partir du CrossCode.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Instatainment was far less enthusiastic about it.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Instatainment était beaucoup moins enthousiaste à propos de son idée.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Their priorities were clear: it was only about controlling avatars.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Leurs priorités étaient claires : Il fallait uniquement pouvoir contrôler les avatars.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Any additional functionality, especially the copying of memories, was unwanted.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Toute fonctionnalité supplémentaire, surtout la copie des souvenirs, étaient indésirables.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: They immediately blocked any effort going into developing Evotars.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Ils ont immédiatement bloqué tout effort qui permettrait le développement des Évotars.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Satoshi...\. he was deeply frustrated about this.
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Satoshi...\. il était profondément frustré de tout ça.

maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.orig: Soon afterwards, Satoshi, Shizuka and Gautham...
maps/flashback/sergey-2.json/entities/11.text: Peu de temps après, Satoshi, Shizuka et Gautham...
Tous les trois... \c[3]sont partis de la société\c[0].
